summary:
The best offense is a good defense
Tired of your ward being almost useless. Ward: Retaliation adds a modified lesser ward that has a chance to knock enemies around or hit them with random spells, all while offering the same protections as a lesser ward
descriptionHtml:
[center]
The best offense is a good defense
WATCH MEH >>> [youtube]blE9WxfT3n0[/youtube]



As usual Discworld Alpha trailer
[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]
[/center]


Adds a new tome in the Winterhold Hall of Elements
Tome teaches Ward: Retaliation
While ward is active there is a 60% chance for things to happen and a 40% chance it acts as just a ward per hit
The % chance is calculated per hit so it will not make 6/10 hits do something in a row but it will average out due to probability

10% chance for enemy to get hit with a firebolt
10% chance for enemy to get hit with a lightningbolt
10% chance for enemy to get hit with a ice spike
10% chance for enemy to be tossed away from player mildly
10% chance for enemy to be tossed upward into the air mildly
10% chance for enemy to be tossed upward into the air violently


Sometimes the ice spike seems to hit the player if they walk forward a bit or the enemy is way to close
Meh, price you pay for wanting to be OP and d/l this
author: darren83
